exec: su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] enable atvsender by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && touch /data/local/ATVdetailsWebhook.config && echo "WH_RECEIVER_HOST=\"123.123.123.123\"" >> /data/local/ATVdetailsWebhook.config && echo "WH_RECEIVER_PORT=\"4444\"" >> /data/local/ATVdetailsWebhook.config && echo "SENDING_INTERVAL_SECONDS=\"300\"" >> /data/local/ATVdetailsWebhook.config && touch /sdcard/sendwebhook && /system/bin/ATVdetailsSender.sh'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] disable atvsender by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && rm -f /sdcard/sendwebhook && /system/bin/vmapper.sh'

su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] install PoGoApp 64bit by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/curl -s -k -L --fail --show-error --user USERNAME:PASSWORD -o /sdcard/Download/pogo.apk http://myUrl.com/apk/pokemongo_arm64-v8a.apk && /system/bin/pm install -r /sdcard/Download/pogo.apk && /system/bin/rm -f /sdcard/Download/pogo.apk && sleep 2 && reboot'

su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] install Vmapperd App by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/curl -s -k -L --fail --show-error --user USERNAME:PASSWORD -o /sdcard/Download/vmapperd.apk http://myUrl.com/apk/vmapperd.apk && /system/bin/pm install -r /sdcard/Download/vmapperd.apk && /system/bin/rm -f /sdcard/Download/vmapperd.apk && sleep 2 && reboot'
echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] uninstall PoGoApp by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && pm uninstall -k com.nianticlabs.pokemongo && sleep 2 && reboot
echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] uninstall Vmapper App by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && pm uninstall -k de.vahrmap.vmapper && sleep 2 && reboot
